edd Angelite was a dwarven resident of Phandalin in the late 15 century DR.
He was friends with fellow teenagers Alana Hallwinter, Sasha Flint, and Grace Hardstone.
When he was a teenager in the 1490s DR, he and two dwarven friends&mdashSasha and Grace&mdashbecame skeptical of some of the tall tales written by Volothamp Geddarm in the newly published Volos Guide to Monsters. The three dwarves decided to travel to the Crooked Forest to investigate, and were subsequently captured by gnolls. Soon, their friend Alana arrived in the woods to search for them, but was captured as well. The harrowing ordeal left Nedd in shock and barely able to speak.
